title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Dec 16 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Dec 16 2021
description:
Clay makes a fashion faux pas on his latest Fox appearance. Joy Reid desperately tries to pick a fight with Elon Musk. Senator "Karen" says Elon Musk "didn't build that rocket ship." Governor Ron DeSantis goes on offense against Critical Race Theory, proposes the Stop WOKE Act. Parents of female swimmers stand up to UPenn and transgender swimmer. ESPN and the rest of sports media ignore UPenn transgender swimmer and the threat to women's sports. Elizabeth Warren once stole a recipe for a Native American cookbook. C&B take calls on Fauxcahontas and Democrats rewriting history.   

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
